availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John F. Sparks (Henry County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Patsy Thulkill Sparks in Henry County, Kentucky, in September 1822. Father of Henry C. Sparks. Married to Eleanor Sparks. Father of George F. Sparks, Amanda Sparks, Isabella Sparks, Francis A. Sparks, and Patsy F. Sparks. Farmer in Henry County in 1850. Owned ten enslaved persons in 1850. Farmer in Henry County in 1860. Owned ten enslaved persons in Henry County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 2, p. 456B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 2.

Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision 1, p. 177B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Henry County Marriages, Film 000259283.
